strong.a: Check out a video from the staff of PASD!

strong.em: PAHS Seniors Herman and Miko Interview Joe Murgo

p.span: Mitchell Miko and Max Herman are taking an online meteorology class. One of their assignments was to interview a meteorologist. They chose to interview WTAJ meteorologist, Joe Murgo. Click here to view the interview.

strong.span: Kidz Meal Bagz starting Thursday, April 2, 2020

img.span: Sheetz Kidz Meal Bagz is a program providing free meals to help children and families in need as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. Meals will be available all day starting Thursday, April 2nd and will include a turkey sandwich, chips and a drink.

p.span: Families interested in taking advantage of the free Kidz Meal Bagz program should go to participating Sheetz locations and ask an employee at the register for a meal. Families will be offered one bag per child. Meals will be available daily while supplies last. (More)
